notes.title: Research for Blog Post
notes.body: I don't really understand the way fetch handles bad requests (400 level status code), do research and provide example for blog post

notes.title: More notes on fetch
notes.body: Reminder that .then(res => res.json()) will fail if the response is not valid JSON (i.e it's an empty string)
